Data Manipulation
```{r}

data2j_KO_control <- data2_j %>% filter(genotype == "KO", day ==7, root>0, ATP_conc ==0)
data2j_KO_treatment <- data2_j %>% filter(genotype == "KO", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc >0)
data2j_WT_control <- data2_j %>% filter(genotype == "WT", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc ==0)
data2j_WT_treatment <- data2_j %>% filter(genotype == "WT", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc >0)

data2_KO_control <- data2 %>% filter(genotype == "KO", day ==7, root>0, ATP_conc ==0)
data2_KO_treatment <- data2 %>% filter(genotype == "KO", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc >0)
data2_WT_control <- data2 %>% filter(genotype == "WT", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc ==0)
data2_WT_treatment <- data2 %>% filter(genotype == "WT", day==7, root>0, ATP_conc >0)

```
